creator.name: Kersten & Co Suriname
creator.his_func: A company linked to the mission of the Evangelical Brotherhood in Paramaribo since 1767. The Brother Christoph Kersten (1733-1796) was the leader of this company, in the beginning a tailoring firm, which was established to finance the work of the missionaries. Mission and business were well linked. The company grew into widespread trading. Around 1880 Kersten & Co had the following departments: a bakery, a printing office, a drapery, a bookshop and a bindery.
creator.notes: See also the description of the record "Zendingsfirma C. Kersten & Co, N.V." in the "Repertorium van Nederlandse zendings- en missie-archieven 1800-1960".
